{"id":432275472,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 9 months","timestamp":1608387340,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/432275472/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"7.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int n = word1.length(), m = word2.length();\n        int dp[n+1][m+1];\n        memset(dp, 0, sizeof(dp));\n        \n        for (int i=0; i<=n; i++) {\n            for (int j=0; j<=m; j++) {\n                if (i==0)\n                    dp[i][j] = j;\n                else if (j==0)\n                    dp[i][j] = i;\n                else if (word1[i-1] == word2[j-1]) {\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1];\n                } else {\n                    dp[i][j] = 1 + min(min(dp[i][j-1], dp[i-1][j]), dp[i-1][j-1]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n              \n        return dp[n][m];\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
